title: Five People Shot In Lexington Park
content:
Five people were shot Sunday night in a Lexington park.
Police said officers were in Douglass Park around 9 p.m. when they heard multiple gun shots.
Officers said one of the victims had life-threatening injuries. Two had minor injuries, and two others were grazed. Police told LEX18, four men and one woman were hit.
No word on any arrests.
Anyone with information on the investigation is asked to contact the Lexington Police Department at (859) 258-3600 or Bluegrass Crime Stoppers at (859) 253-2020.
